Comparative Analysis on factors of Competitiveness among the Container Shipping Companies in Korea
Comparative Analysis on factors of Competitiveness among the Container Shipping Companies in Korea

abstract.#text: 해운불황에 따른 한진해운의 파산은 무역대국인 한국의 성장발전에 큰 부담을 주기 때문에 무너진 글로벌 공급사슬의 한 축을 복원하기 위한 선사들의 협력 및 발전방안에 대한 연구가 요구된다. 글로벌선사들에 비해 영업이익률 측면에서 상대적으로 양호한 실적을 보이고 있는 근해선사들의 경쟁력 요인이 무엇인지 용선비율, 항로특성 등에 대해 글로벌 선사들의 그것과 비교·분석하였다. 글로벌 컨테이너 선사와 국적 근해선사 간의 영업이익률과 용선비율의 차이는 통계적 유의성이 있는 것으로 나타났다. 패널데이타를 이용한 회귀분석 결과 CCFI는 (+) 연료유가격(-)은 각각 1% 수준에서 통계적 유의성을 보였으나, 서비스지역 특성을 나타내는 변수는 (+)의 부호를 보였으나 통계적 유의성을 보이지 못하였다. 특히 개별 선사의 보유선박량은 통계적으로 유의하지 않지만 영업이익률에 음(-) 영향을 보인 것은 현 시장상황이 대형선사에게 유리하지 않음을 보인다.

The profit ratios (profit divided by revenue) of Korean shipping companies operating intra-Asia are relatively higher than those of Korean shipping companies operating globally. Thus, this study conducts a comparison of the factors of competitiveness between the two groups. First, by adopting ANOVA, this study tests whether there are any substantial differences in the profit and charter-in ratios between the two groups. Second, we set up a model to test the route specialization by using a dummy variable. As a result of estimation, CCFI and bunker price exerted statistically significant impacts on the profit ratios with positive and negative sign respectively. Although the dummy variable carries a positive sign, it is not statistically significant. However the effects of charter-in ratio and TEU-owned are obscure. In conclusion, it is necessary for policy makers to review the shipping policies toward the intra-Asian shipping market to constrain the destructive competition prevailing in the global shipping market and to enhance cooperation between the shipping companies operating intra-Asia and those operating globally.

article-title.#text: 항해용선계약상 FIOST 조항에 의한 운송인 의무의 위반에 관한 연구 -Eems Solar호 사건을 중심으로-
Breach of Carrier's Duty by FIOST Clause under Voyage Charterparty: Focus on the Eems Solar Case
Breach of Carrier's Duty by FIOST Clause under Voyage Charterparty: Focus on the Eems Solar Case

abstract.#text: Eems Solar호 사건은 FIOST 조항과 적부불량에 대해 쟁점이 되었던 사안이다. 이 사건에서 피고는 용선계약상의 선주이며, 해당 용선계약은 이 조항을 편입하고 있었다. 따라서 용선계약이 편입되었다고 주장하는 선하증권이 발행되었으며 그 최종소지인은 원고이다. 이 사건판결에서 이 조항이 선하증권에 편입된 것이 인정되었기 때문에 이 조항의 유효성과 구체적인 적용가능성이 쟁점이 되었다. 그런데 이 조항의 적용가능성과 적용범위 등이 명확하지 않아 실무에서도 이 조항에 의한 해결을 주저하고 있는 실정이다. 따라서 계약책임 범위 등의 검토를 통해 이 조항의 구체적·지위적인 요건·효력을 분명하게 할 필요가 있을 것이다.

Under the bill of lading that incorporates the FIOST terms of the charterparty, shippers, charterers, and consignees are to perform, supervise, and pay for loading, stowage, and discharge. The Eems Solar case concerned a claim by a bill of lading holder against a shipowner regarding damage to cargo caused by bad stowage, for which, under the terms of the charterparty incorporated into the bills of lading, the shipowner was not responsible. The case involved a cargo of steel sheets that had shifted and damaged in bad weather. The shipowner successfully claimed the protection of a term incorporated into the bill of lading, which removed from them “any risk, liability and expense whatsoever” in respect of stowage, a defense that obviously defended on the finding that damage was caused by bad stowage. A significant proportion of the judgment was devoted to determining the facts and the inferences to be drawn. The cargo-owner argued that the vessel was improperly equipped to preserve the cargo from damage, in that carried insufficient lashings, and that the crew had failed to inspect and relash the cargo during the voyage. This paper analyze the breach of carrier’s duty by the FIOST clause by focusing on the Eems Solar case.

article-title.#text: 해운기업의 재무건전성 지표에 영향을 미치는 요인 분석
Factors Influencing Financial Soundness Indicators in Shipping Companies
Factors Influencing Financial Soundness Indicators in Shipping Companies

abstract.#text: 이 논문은 전 세계 상위 61개의 해운기업을 대상으로 2009년부터 2013년까지의 자료를 이용하여 자본조달에 관한 기업의 특성과 재무건전성과의 관계를 분석하였다. 패널 데이터를 이용하여 FGLS 회귀분석을 실시하는 연구방법을 사용하였다. 실증분석결과 자산의 유형성이 재무건전성과 깊은 관련이 있음을 발견하였다. 유형자산의 비율이 높은 기업일수록 부채의존도가 높게 나타났다. 또한 해운기업의 유동부채비율이 재무건전성에 영향을 미치는 중요한 요인으로 나타났다. 한국의 해운기업 뿐만 아니라 전 세계 해운기업들의 현재 재무구조는 단기 운영자금의 의존도가 상당히 높다고 할 수 있다. 해운기업은 재무구조의 건전성을 개선시키고 경영효율성을 높이는 구조조정이 필요하다.

Companies that have a solid financial structure tend to increase a debt level to the extent that they can afford to maximize their shareholder value. But if the debt level becomes higher, the cash flow from operating activities decreases. The decrease of after-tax cash flow will induce a higher risk of insolvency. This study analyzes the factors that influence the financial stability and that are likely to have a decisive impact on a company's survival and bankruptcy. It focuses on the relationship between the characteristics of the shipping companies and their financial soundness by using the data of the world's top 61 shipping companies from 2009 to 2013. Feasible Generalized Least square(FGLS) regression analyses are conducted for the empirical study using panel data. The study finds that the tangibility of assets of shipping firms is closely related to financial soundness. Shipping firms with higher tangible assets have easy recourse to debt, because vessels can serve as collateral. In addition, the study finds that the liquidity ratio of shipping firms is associated with financial stability. Current liabilities account for about 80% of the equity in shipping companies. Further, shipping companies are found to have low stability of the capital structure. Therefore, they need to restructure the organization to enhance their effectiveness and financial soundness.

article-title.#text: 주요 국제여객터미널의 정보서비스 실태분석에 관한 연구
Analysis of Information Service in Major International Passenger Terminals
Analysis of Information Service in Major International Passenger Terminals

abstract.#text: 본 연구는 부산 국제여객터미널과 인천 국제여객터미널 정보서비스의 실태를 분석하는 것을 목적으로 수행되었다. 연구의 목적을 달성하기 위해, 웹 콘텐츠 분석, 사용자 만족도분석, 웹 접근성, 웹 성능, 웹-모바일 호환성분석 기법을 이용하여 분석을 실시하였다. 그 결과 부산 국제여객터미널이 인천 국제여객터미널에 비해 전반적으로 미흡한 측면이 많은 것으로 나타났다. 특히 부산국제여객터미널의 경우 콘텐츠 부분에 있어 사용자 편의를 위한 정보서비스가 취약한 것으로 분석되었다. 또한 국제 여객터미널 특성에 따라 외국인의 이용 빈도가 높지만 부산 국제여객터미널과 인천 국제여객터미널 공통적으로 제2외국어 지원이 이루어지지 않은 점을 발견하였다. 마지막으로, 모바일 환경의 발전에 따라 거의 모든 웹 사이트들이 모바일 환경과의 호환성을 비중 있게 취급하고 있지만, 국제여객터미널 웹 사이트들은 모바일 환경에 부적합한 측면이 많다는 점을 발견하였으며, 이 부분에 대한 개선책 마련이 필요하다는 점을 지적하였다.

The aim of this study is to analyze the actual status of information service offered by international passenger terminals. To achieve this objective, we adopted an evaluation model from previous research and used several research methodologies including the and the web functionality analysis. Further, to analyze web functionality, we used analysis tools such as K-WAH 4.0, Google Page Speed Insights, and W3C Mobile OK. The results of the revealed the presence of gaps between overall importance and satisfaction of information service for both Busan and Incheon terminals. In particular, the Busan terminal had many shortcomings in the aspect of user-friendliness, compared to Incheon. Further, although almost all provide information service through mobile devices, the results of the web functionality analysis revealed that the websites of both Busan and Incheon terminals have problems with web compatibility for mobile devices, we that it is urgently necessary to improve.

article-title.#text: 도선사회의 조직공정성과 조직적지원이 도선사의 직무만족과 직무몰입에 미치는 영향
An Effect of Organizational Justice and Organizational Support of the Pilots’ Association on Job Satisfaction and Job Commitment of the Pilot
An Effect of Organizational Justice and Organizational Support of the Pilots’ Association on Job Satisfaction and Job Commitment of the Pilot

abstract.#text: 본 연구는 도선사회의 조직공정성과 조직적지원이 도선사의 직무만족과 직무몰입에 어떠한 영향을 미치는가를 분석해 보고, 이를 통하여 도선사의 직무만족과 직무몰입을 증진시킬 수 있는 방안을 제시하고자 한다. 본 연구의 목적을 달성하기 위하여 조직공정성과 조직적지원에 관한 선행연구와 문헌조사를 실시하였다. 또한 가설검정과 실증연구에 필요한 통계자료를 수집하기 위하여 설문지법을 이용하였다. 실증분석에서는 도선 업무에 종사하고 있는 도선사들을 대상으로 자기기재 방법 설문지를 사용하였다. 본 연구의 결과는 조직의 자발성과 자유재량이 매우 제한적인 도선사회에서도 조직공정성과 조직적 지원이 구성원의 직무만족과 직무몰입에 미치는 영향이 있음을 보여주었다.

Pilot’s job satisfaction and job commitment closely affects not only job performance of the pilot but also safety and efficient operation of the port. Nevertheless, any studies have not been done on this matter yet. The purpose of this studies are summarized as followings. Frist, it is to examine the effects of organizational justice and organizational support of the Pilots’ Association on job satisfaction and job commitment of pilot. Second, this studies examine the effects on job satisfaction and job commitment of the pilot from interaction between organizational justice and organizational support, and then suggests ways to enhance job satisfaction and job commitment of the pilot. To test the established hypothesis, 81 questionnaires from 11 districts of pilotage in Korea are used in the analysis. The statistical analysis based on the survey data was processed with SPSSWIN(V.18.0) in order to the reliability and validity, and also multiple regression analysis and ANOVA analysis were carried out.

article-title.#text: 순차적 맘퀴스트 지수를 활용한 해운서비스기업의 생산성 변화 결정요인 분석
Analysis of the Determinants of Efficiency and Productivity of Shipping Companies by using the Sequential Malmquist Index
Analysis of the Determinants of Efficiency and Productivity of Shipping Companies by using the Sequential Malmquist Index

abstract.#text: 본 연구는 해운서비스기업을 대상으로 순차적 맘퀴스트 지수를 활용하여 생산성 변화를 분석하고, 이러한 생산성 변화에 영향을 미치는 요인을 분석하는데 연구목적이 있다. 해운서비스기업 42개의 2010년에서 2015년까지 재무제표 자료를 기초로 순차적 맘퀴스트 지수를 활용하여 생산성 변화를 분석한 결과에서 해운서비스기업의 생산성은 연평균 4% 감소하였고, 효율성은 연평균 8.0% 감소한 것으로 나타났다. 패널회귀분석을 활용하여 순차적 맘퀴스트 지수에 영향을 미치는 요인을 분석한 결과에서 해운서비스기업의 유동비율, 자본집약도 및 판매비집약도는 t기 순차적 맘퀴스트 지수에 정의 영향을 미치는 것으로 나타난 반면, t-1기 순차적 맘퀴스트 지수, 자기자본비율, 및 인건비집약도는 t기 순차적 맘퀴스트 지수에 부의 영향을 미치는 것으로 나타났다. 일반관리비집약도 및 시장점유율은 순차적 맘퀴스트 지수에 유의적인 영향을 미치지 못하는 것으로 나타났다. 이러한 연구결과는 해운서비스기업에게 관리적 관점에서 시사점을 제공한다.

This study analyzed the factors affecting the sequential Malmquist index. First, the analysis of all shipping companies shows that the current ratio, capital intensity, and selling expense intensity had significant positive effects on the sequential Malmquist index in current period. The employment cost intensity and the sequential Malmquist index in previous period had significant negative impacts on the sequential Malmquist index in current period. Second, the analysis of large-scale shipping companies shows that the current ratio had a significant positive effect on the sequential Malmquist index in current period. Third, the analysis of small- and medium-sized shipping companies indicates that the current ratio and capital intensity had significant positive effects on the sequential Malmquist index in current period, whereas employment cost intensity, equity ratio, and the sequential Malmquist index in previous period had significant negative impacts on the sequential Malmquist index in current period.

article-title.#text: 한국과 미국의 공급사슬보안 생태계 비교 및 시사점 연구
Supply Chain Security Ecosystem: Comparison between Korea and United States and Its Implication
Supply Chain Security Ecosystem: Comparison between Korea and United States and Its Implication

abstract.#text: 2001년 미국에서 발생한 9/11 테러는 글로벌 공급사슬보안에 대한 관심을 부각시켰고, 최근 IS의 테러위협, 세월호 참사, 북한 핵위협 등의 국내 사회경제적 변화는 공급사슬보안(Supply Chain Security)의 중요성을 재조명하고 있다. 우리나라는 SCS 강화를 위해 AEO 프로그램을 도입하여 기업의 참여를 유도하고 있으나 참여율이 저조한 실정이다. 따라서 본 연구는 국가차원의 SCS 생태계를 점검하고 이를 활성화하는 방안을 모색하고자 하였다. 이를 위해 국가 SCS 생태계는 정부-민간과 기업-기업 관계로 구조화하고 게임이론을 적용하여 분석하였다. 분석 결과, AEO 인증의 비용부담이나 높은 평가기준으로 참여가 어려운 기업에게 협력을 통해 복수기업 단위로 인증을 획득할 수 있는 기회를 제공하고, 공급사슬 간 파트너의 통합 보안체계 구축을 활성화는 제도가 필요한 것으로 나타났다. 또한 상대적으로 테러위협에 취약한 물류기업의 인증프로그램 참여를 확대하고, 통관 관련 부처 간 협력 체계의 강화가 필요한 것으로 나타났다.

After the September 11, 2001 terrorist attacks against the United States, attention to global supply chain security(SCS) has increased. In addition, recent socioeconomic changes in Korea such as its inclusion in a list of potential terrorist targets by Islamic State, the advancement of North Korea’s nuclear weapons program, the Sewol ferry disaster, have prompted further review of SCS. In response, Korea has adopted the authorized economic operator(AEO) program. However, the rate of company participation to the AEO program is gradually shrinking. Therefore, this study aims to analyze whether the national SCS ecosystem is well formed and to determine methods to activate it. In particular, the study categorizes this ecosystem into government-private and company-company securities and uses game theory to analyze both.
The government–private security game deals with customs clearance of cargoes that is modeled according to queuing theory, while the interaction between government and the private sector is descried as a principal–agent Stakelberg game. The outcomes of the game indicate that a scheme to overcome the differences of financial burden on private parties for AEO certification costs, according to the characteristics of their scales and types, is required. The study suggests two schemes. First, the AEO certification program should be expanded to include multiple companies as one unit, which can provide an advantage for small businesses as it would allow them to cooperate to overcome the security certification cost and demanding standards. Second, cooperation between customs-related authorities should be strengthened to provide a one-stop customs clearance with effective benefits for private sectors.
The company–company security game is a three-player game dealing with interactions between manufacturers, logistics providers, and terrorists. In this game, manufacturers and logistics providers attempt to ensure their security by minimizing expected loss, while terrorists strive to maximize the probability of successful attacks. Thus, the strategies of the supply chain against terrorist attacks can be considered in terms of distributed or centralized. The outcomes of the game are follows. First, a measure to overcome the relative terror vulnerability of logistics providers compared to manufacturers is required: A national specialized logistics security program is required in which most logistics providers can participate regardless of their size and type. Second, a policy should be framed to integrate security activities of the supply chain so as to minimize national security costs without adversely impacting national security.
Thus, this study’s significance is that it quantitatively shows that it is necessary to overcome the weakness of the current AEO program in order to vitalize the national SCS ecosystem, in accordance with the characteristics of business scale and type. In this way, the AEO program can encourage voluntary participation from private sector entities of various sizes and types, thereby enhancing the level of national security while minimizing related costs.

article-title.#text: 항만투자가 해상물동량에 미치는 요인 분석 - 항만사회간접자본을 중심으로 -
Factor Analysis of Port Investment's Impact on Maritime Traffic: A Focus on Port SOC
Factor Analysis of Port Investment's Impact on Maritime Traffic: A Focus on Port SOC

abstract.#text: 항만 투자가 국가 경제에 미치는 기여를 추정하기 위해서는 항만 투자로 인한 항만 SOC 증가가 물동량에 어떠한 영향을 미치는 지 추정이 필요하다. 본 연구는 패널자료를 사용하는 고정효과모형을 통해 추정하여 1920년부터 2015년 96년간의 기간 중 일본 내 1,082개 항만을 대상으로 6개 부문으로 세분류된 항만자본스톡과 해상 물동량 간의 상관관계를 추정하였다. 본 연구의 실증분석 결과에 따르면, 컨테이너 부두 관련 항만 자본 스톡이 1.0% 증가하면 항만물동량은 0.15% 증가하고, 일반 부두 관련 항만 자본 스톡이 1.0% 증가 시 항만물동량은 0.09% 증가한다. 무엇보다 방파제·방파호안 등의 파제 시설 자본 스톡이 물동량에 높은 영향을 미치는 것으로 나타났는데, 파제 시설 관련 자본 스톡 1.0% 증가 시 해상 물동량은 0.32% 증가하는 것으로 추정되었다. 본 연구의 회귀 분석 결과는 항만투자로 인한 항만 SOC 증가는 물동량 확대로 이어질 수 있음을 보여주는 것으로, 장래 적극적인 항만투자가 필요함을 시사하고 있다.

Recently, Korea has been witnessing the emergence of some idle ports whose cargo-handling capacities are bigger than their sea traffic, frequently raising concerns over excessive port investments. Thus, it is important to find a logical explanation for whether investments in port social overhead capital(SOC) can ultimately contribute toward increasing the traffic volume of ports, even the nation's economic development. In this study, using the fixed effects model with panel data, we investigate the impact of port SOC on maritime traffic. In order to investigate the relationships between port SOC and maritime volume, panel data covering a period of 97 years and 1,082 ports was applied to a regression model. Panel data could be collected by collaborating with the Ministry of Land, Infrastructure, Transport and Tourism (MLIT). MLIT now periodically announces the SOC amount of Japanese ports. First, we followed the rules set by the MLIT, according to which the port SOCs was divided into six categories: “the development of new port", “the development of container berth", “the development of bulk berth", “the jetty facilities like breakwater", “the maintenance of port", and “the navigation facilities." Then, we performed the regression analysis by setting the maritime traffic as the dependent variable and the forementioned six categories as independent variables.
By applying the Hausman and LR tests, we could find that the fixed effect model is statistically more appropriate than the random effect model for this study. The primary results of this study in the fixed effect model are that the coefficients of “the development of container berth", “the development of bulk berth", “the jetty facilities" show a positive (+) impact on the dependent variable, the sea traffic. Contrarily, the coefficients of “the development of new port", “the maintenance of port", and “the navigation facilities" show a negative (­) impact. The coefficients of the development of container berth and the development of bulk berth show that the maritime traffic will increase by 0.15% and 0.09% if the SOC of the development of container berth or the development of bulk berth increase by 1%. The coefficient of the development of new port explains that if the SOC of the development of new port increases by 1.0%, the maritime traffic will decrease by 0.05%. In addition, the coefficients of the maintenance of port and the navigation facilities show that their elasticities for sea traffic are -0.06 and -0.09, respectively.
Especially, the coefficient of “the jetty facilities like breakwater" has a strong impact on maritime traffic. The result of the fixed effects model regression, indicates that the maritime traffic will increase by 0.32% when the SOC of the jetty facilities increase by 1.0%. Therefore, we can conclude that port authorities(like the Ministry of Maritime Affairs and Fisheries) find it appropriate to invest in port SOC including jetty facilities for increasing maritime traffic in the future.

article-title.#text: 항만투자예산의 구조분석에 관한 연구
Structural Analysis of Port Investment Budget
Structural Analysis of Port Investment Budget

abstract.#text: 본 연구에서는 일부 항만의 재정예산 집중화 경향과는 다르게 평택·당진항 등 중소형항만은 예산 확보에 어려움을 겪어온 문제를 배경으로 항만 예산 배분의 형평성을 검토하기 위해 항만투자예산의 구조를 분석하였다. 연구의 문제는 대형항만 재정예산 집중화 경향이 중소항만의 민간투자 예산 편성으로 이어졌는지를 검토하는 것이다. 이를 위해 국내 5대 항만, 부산, 인천, 광양, 평택·당진, 울산항의 재정예산과 민간투자예산을 자료로 하였으며 연구방법론으로는 회귀분석과 상관분석을 적용하였다. 연구 결과, 부산항 재정 예산과 인천 민자 예산 및 평택·당진항 민자 예산 간에 상관관계가 높았다. 회귀분석 결과, 광양항 민자 예산에는 설명력()이 0.144로 낮은 수준이었고 울산항 민자 예산도 0.183으로 역시 낮은 수준이었다. 하지만 인천항 민자 예산과 평택·당진항 민자 예산은 각각 0.432와 0.408으로 높은 설명력을 보였다.

In South Korea, port development has a rich history. In the early 1980’s, Korea built a dedicated container terminal in Busan Port using a loan granted by International Bank for Reconstruction and Development (IBRD). At that time, the commercial container port era revealed. In 2001, the ‘development roadmap of domestic trading ports’ supported a two-port system as a co-development of Busan and Gwangyang Ports so as to two-port has been gained a lot of development funds by both public and private sectors. Some of the small and medium-sized ports, such as Pyeongtaek-Dangjin, Port have different financial budget deviation tendencies than of megaports such as Busan Port. Although the development of port facilities has been announced, there have been difficulties in raising private funds to develop ports. In order to analyze the regional balance and fairness of the port investment budget allocation, this study chose five domestic large ports, Busan, Incheon, Gwangyang, Pyeongtaek-Dangjin, and Ulsan. This study analyzed the financial budget of public and private investment budgets of these ports. The modified second and newly third domestic trading port development roadmap investment budgets were used as data in this study, and an empirical analysis was conducting using correlation analysis and regression analysis. The result revealed a high correlation between the financial budget of Busan Port and private budget of Incheon Port. The financial budget of Busan Port and Pyeongtaek-Dangjin Port were also found to have a high correlation. The regression analysis results revealed that the private budget of Gwangyang Port has a low explanatory degree. The R-square score also could not confirm the statistical significance at 0.144. The private budget of Ulsan Port is 0.183. However, the private budget of Incheon Port and Pyeongtaek-Dangjin Port showed a relatively high explanatory power at 0.432 and 0.408 respectively. The results of the regression analysis showed that during 2006-2010 the private budget of Gwangyang Port positively affected the public budget of Busan Port. The score also confirms the statistical significance at 0.850. The private budget of Pyeongtaek-Dangjin Port has relatively explanatory for public budget of Busan Port; the score is 0.378. The other ports have low explanatory power for the public budget of Busan Port. During 2011-2020, the private budget of Gwangyang Port is 0.373, Incheon has 0.360, Ulsan has 0.033, Pyeongtaek-Dangjin has an score of 0.080. Thus, Hypothesis 1 (there is a correlation between large ports and small and medium-sized ports) was partially confirmed by the correlation analysis results. Hypothesis 2 (financial budget of the large port positively affects the private budget of small and medium-sized ports) was also partially confirmed given the Incheon Port and Pyeongtaek-Dangjin Port analysis results. This study focused on regional balance of port investment budget and fairness of budget allocation. If it were to focus on another aspect such as efficiency or effectiveness as another policy evaluation criterion, it would be more efficient to concentrate investments in the one or two megaports. Therefore, this study has such limitation.

article-title.#text: System Dynamics를 활용한 동북아항로 운항 효율성에 관한 연구
A Study on the Efficiency of Operating Feeder Ship in Northern Asia Short Sea using System Dynamics
A Study on the Efficiency of Operating Feeder Ship in Northern Asia Short Sea using System Dynamics

abstract.#text: 본 연구는 시스템 다이내믹스(System Dynamics)를 활용해 한중일 운항선박의 효율성을 살펴보며, 이 구간 내 운항중인 실제선박을 모델로 투입하여 TEU단위당 비용을 확인하였다. 인천항, 부산항을 중심으로 중국 상해항, 일본 동경항 항로에 316TEU급 선박, 1019TEU급 선박, 1740TEU급 선박을 투입하여 한중일 피더항로에도 규모의 경제가 발생하는지 분석하였다. 선박운항 변수로는 선박속도, 용선료, 유류비, 화물소석률을 선정하여 그에 따른 변동성을 살펴보고 구간별 최적선박을 제시하였다. 연구결과 시스템 다이내믹스 방법을 이용해 운항선박의 각 변수를 투입시켰을 시 구간별 거리에 따라 최적선박이 달라졌으며, 구간이 상대적으로 긴 구간에서 규모의 경제가 발생하는 것을 확인하였다. 또한 상대적으로 용선료, 유류비보다는 화물 소석률 변수가 운항비용에 미치는 영향이 큰 것으로 확인되었다. 연구의 시사점으로는 불안정한 해운시장환경에 맞춰 신속하고 유연한 대처가 필요하며, 외부환경요인에 대한 장기적 모니터링을 실시해 선박투입을 결정할 필요가 있다.

This study researched the efficiency of vessels in the marine transportation markets of Korea, China, and Japan by using system dynamics and confirmed the costs per twenty-foot equivalent unit (TEU) by inputting the actual vessels operated in these routes as models. For routes from Incheon and Busan Ports to Shanghai Port, in China, and Tokyo Port, in Japan, three vessels—one each of 316 TEU, 1,019 TEU, and 1,740 TEU—were input to investigate whether economies of scale occur in feeder routes of Korea, China, and Japan. Vessel speed, charterage, oil expenses, and loading rate were selected as variables of vessel navigation. Fluctuation rate was also researched and the optimal linear per route was presented. When each variable was input through system dynamics, the optimal linear per route varied depending on route distance, and for relatively long distances, economies of scale were experienced. When charterage was set as a variable, the effective vessel from Korea to Shanghai was the 1,019 TEU B vessel. When oil expenses and loading rate were low, vessels with low cargo capacity were effective. When the quantity of goods transported was drastically increased for the Korea, China, and Japan routes, the 1,700 vessel of C Vessel was the most effective. During navigation at the Tokyo Port, B Vessel departing Incheon Port was the most effective in oil price change, followed by C Vessel; B Vessel departing Busan Port was effective. The 300 TEU A Vessel was identified to be a navigation exemption vessel due to its navigation distance of 1,016 miles from Incheon Port. The optimal vessel for oil price change was B Vessel leaving for Shanghai Port; however, it should be a substitute for C Vessel when the charterage and quantity of goods transported between the routes are increased. Regardless of oil price change between these routes, A Vessel had low competitiveness and its transportation unit price would be lower when the vessel lowers the speed considering oil price variability. Concerning the routes to Tokyo Port, the navigation distance from Busan Port was shorter than that from Incheon Port, and therefore, B Vessel was effective, unlike C Vessel.
The cost of each unit depending on the loading rate had a greater effect on navigation expenses than charterage and oil price change. For Shanghai Port, at 100% loading rate, the optimal vessels were C Vessel, B Vessel, and C Vessel. At 50%, B Vessel and C Vessel were effective. A Vessel was more effective at 100% loading rate (300 TEU) than B Vessel at 50% (500 TEU) loading rate. This finding implies that oil expenses and charterage, which are external market elements, were greatly reflected, and therefore, it is not economical. Moreover, for Busan and Tokyo Ports, the navigation distances were shorter than the route of Incheon Port; therefore, B Vessel was effective. When the loading rate of A Vessel was enhanced and its speed was reduced, thus decreasing total navigation expenses, it was more effective for short distances. This study can be helpful to long-term vessel operations on the Korea, China, and Japan routes. Feeder vessel companies are relatively small in comparison to large ones and hence need long-term monitoring, which has thus far been neglected. The former also need prompt and flexible measures to cope with the unstable marine transportation market environment and are required to decide vessel input through long-term monitoring of external environmental factors.

article-title.#text: 원양선사와 근해선사의 아시아 역내 해운 서비스 네트워크 비교 연구
Service Networks between Trunk and Feeder Liners in the intra-Asia Container Shipping Market: A Comparison Study
Service Networks between Trunk and Feeder Liners in the intra-Asia Container Shipping Market: A Comparison Study

abstract.#text: 본 연구는 아시아 역내 정기선 해운시장에서 원양선사와 근해선사가 어떠한 경쟁구도를 형성하고 있는지 그 윤곽을 그려보는 데 목적을 두고 있다. 이를 위해 선사 간, 선사 그룹 간 서비스 네트워크의 유사성을 사회 네트워크 분석기법을 적용하여 평가하였다. 세계 20대 정기 선사 중 12개 선사와 우리나라의 8개 근해선사를 대상으로 선사별 네트워크의 연결성과 네트워크 간 유사성을 비교한 결과 원양선사들과 근해선사들의 아시아 역내 정기선 서비스 네트워크는 높은 유사성을 나타내었다. 이는 전통적으로 근해선사들의 서비스 영역이었던 아시아 역내 시장에서 원양선사들이 실질적인 경쟁자로 등장하고 있으며 경쟁구도가 고도화될 것임을 시사한다.

This study aims to outline the competitive landscape of the trunk and feeder liners in the intra-Asia container shipping market. The Social Network Analysis (SNA) method is used to evaluate the similarities and differences in the intra-Asia container shipping service networks between: (i)20 liners, and (ii)12 global trunk liners and 8 Korean feeder liners. Presently, 12 out of the global top 20 carriers are operating in the intra-Asia market. This study focuses on these trunk and feeder liners by conducting an empirical analysis to measure selected network connectivity indices, and to compare similarities in the structure of the liner shipping service networks. This empirical study reveals that, in the intra-Asia container market, three trunk liners(MCC transports, Evergreen, and Wanhai) and two domestic liners(Heung-A and KMTC) have dominant market share in terms of network connectivity, which is measured by the number of links between the ports, network density, connection degree, and inclusiveness. Therefore, it is evident that these five carriers operate in a relatively high level of networks in the intra-Asia region. MCC transports, a subsidiary of Maersk located in Singapore, has built an equivalent level of an intra-Asia service network with other competitive Asian origin trunk and feeder companies, such as Evergreen, Hanjin, HMM, Heung-A, and KMTC which have abundant management experiences in the intra-Asia shipping market. It has not been long since the global mega carriers entered the intra-Asia market; however, it seems that the Danish giant has been gaining access to the traditional business areas of Asian container shipping companies. In particular, at the group level comparison, connectivity indices indicate that the feeder liner group only has a small advantage over the trunk liner group; although it dose not seem to be significant. Futhermore, a correlation analysis of the networks of each company revealed that many shipping firms operating in the intra-Asia route had established similar types of service networks. As the eight feeder liners are Korean companies, it can be said that their similarity is natural; however, a similar situation is observed with the trunk liners. In addition, the correlation analysis of the integrated networks for the two different liner groups also presents a high level of similarity in the intra-Asia shipping market. This result can be considered a warning to the Korean feeder liners that, in the near future, the intra-Asia routes will become more competitive. Eventually, when the trunk liners’ Panamax vessels will be transitioned from the current trans-Pacific route into the intra-Asia service network due to the expansion of the Panama Cannel in June 2016, the market competition will be more intense. Consequently, the Korean shipping lines need to build a strategic policy to enhance their competitiveness in the intra-Asia liner market.
